name: Tim Blackwell
content: Dr Tim Blackwell | Goldsmiths, University of London Main menu Staff & students In this section Staff details Position Senior Lecturer Department Computing Email tim.blackwell (@gold.ac.uk) Links Websitetimblackwell.com I am interesting in all things swarming and musical. My research interests include swarm intelligence, computer music, cellular autonoma, music complexity and the multiverse Academic qualifications BSc Physics 1980 DPhil Theoretical Physics 1984 MSc Computer Science 2001 Featured publications 2002: Improvised music with swarms 2006: Multiswarms, exclusion, and anti-convergence in dynamic environments 2007: Particle Swarm Optimization: an overview 2012: A Study of Collapse in Bare Bones Particle Swarm Optimization 2018: Impact of Communication Topology in Particle Swarm Optimization Publications and research outputs Book SectionOn the Optimization of Systems Using AI Metaheuristics and Evolutionary Algorithms Tkach, Itshak; and Blackwell, Tim . 2023.
